About SOLARIS

Solaris 2022 is a flagship national level commerce and management fests conducted by The Student Council of the distinguished institution Jain College - CGS.
Solaris 2022, a colossal event with it's prominent rounds in various spheres of the corporate world, attracts the best of talent to one tribune. This year, it's only going to get better, bigger and more exciting. So unveil your business skills, keep your spirits high and hop to the right place to showcase your talent within.
"Management skills are better demonstrated by impactful endeavors"
At Solaris 2022, we lay emphasis on learning concepts through real life situations and case studies .
Solaris acts as a platform for participants to grow their network and exchange novel ideas in cracking the corporate crisis and gaining a holistic view of leadership.
